about_the_game:
The hero's life went downhill: he became addicted to alcohol, because of which he lost a promising job and broke up with his girlfriend. Among the grayness of everyday life bright only dreams remained, but no matter how interesting and beautiful the dream was, there always comes a moment when you need to wake up ...

In the first episode the hero will find himself on a pirate island, face the echoes of the “past” life and come face to face with his enemy.

Features:

- Low-polygon stylization.

- Picturesque fantasy landscapes.

- Narration through environments and notes.

- Simple but curious puzzles.

- The duration is about one hour
